body_html:
I'm sorry, I'm not sure what's going on on your system. I tried your snippet again without modification on PyTorch 0.3.1, and I only saw ~15BM more memory being allocated.
Are you running your latest script, the one that does not use tnt?

body:
I'm sorry, I'm not sure what's going on on your system. I tried your snippet again without modification on PyTorch 0.3.1, and I only saw ~15BM more memory being allocated.
Are you running your latest script, the one that does not use `tnt`?
